name: Loving Life (itch)
description:
"I cried, but not because I wanted to live longer. I cried because I realized how painful it was for the ones who loved me."

Loving Life is a short non-fictional artistic visual novel created by Zhenghua Yang (Z). At age 18, a near-fatal experience changed the way Zhenghua viewed the world, transforming him into the very type of person he never thought he could be.
